cases.title: Production-Grade Kubernetes Setup at PayPal
cases.description: How PayPal built a production-ready Kubernetes platform serving 1000+ applications...
cases.content:
# Kubernetes Production Setup
            
            Our production Kubernetes setup includes:
            
            ## Infrastructure
            - 50+ worker nodes
            - Multi-zone deployment
            - Persistent storage with Ceph
            
            ## Monitoring Stack
            - Prometheus for metrics
            - Grafana for visualization
            - Alertmanager for notifications
            
            ## Security
            - Network policies
            - Pod security policies
            - RBAC configuration
            
            ## CI/CD Pipeline
            - GitLab CI integration
            - ArgoCD for GitOps
            - Automated testing
            
            ## Configuration Files
            ```yaml
            apiVersion: apps/v1
            kind: Deployment
            metadata:
              name: production-app
            spec:
              replicas: 10
              selector:
                matchLabels:
                  app: production-app
            ```

cases.title: Kubernetes at Shopify: Scaling to Black Friday
cases.description: Our experience scaling Kubernetes infrastructure for Black Friday traffic...
